sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Container, Menu, Input, Icon, } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom'; import { authenticationService } from '../services' const Navbar = () => { const loginOut = () => { authenticationService.logout() window.location.reload(false) } return (
The Sun News {authenticationService.isAuthenticated ? Logout : <> Login Sign up } Home Sports World Business
)} export default Navbar;
